alert.note: Alert for Pawnee; Stafford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 4:27PM CDT until May 09 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Pawnee County in south central Kansas... Northwestern Stafford County in south central Kansas... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 426 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Larned, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Larned around 445 PM CDT. Two inch diameter hail was reported 6 miles north...northwest of Larned at 425 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Radium. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
